Job Title: Finance Director

Location: Lakeville, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Description

Every professional wants to work for an industry leader. Now is your chance as Hearth & Home Technologies is hiring a Finance Director in Lakeville, MN.

A career at Hearth & Home Technologies puts you in the position of working with the most popular brands in the industry, and having an impact on a product that people love. The hearth is the center of the home and family life.

The Finance Director is responsible for supporting profitable growth initiatives by providing financial guidance and oversight to the Hearth & Home Technologies Stove business unit leadership team through effective expense management and identification and realization of revenue and profit growth opportunities.

What You Will Do

Provide financial guidance and support to the Stove business unit leaders across sales, marketing, and product on spend management.Partner closely with business unit leaders to lead finance strategy, planning, and execution. Collaborate and provide guidance into business cases that support key business initiatives.Influence and impact results to achieve corporate objectives of sales growth, profit improvement, and customer satisfaction.Conduct data analysis, planning, strategizing and advising to senior management.Sales Growth: Provide financial support to all strategic initiatives.Profit Growth: Provide financial analysis that will drive profit improvement and effectively analyze and communicate results.Oversee overall sales compensation process.Oversee sales forecasting process.Develop, implement, manage and monitor business unit pricing strategy.Partner with senior finance team and leadership team to develop and implement strategies to drive operating expense efficiencies. Assist in the annual and quarterly budget process to build realistic and fully-explainable budgets and forecasts.Lead and effectively support and promote the development of staff. Provide support for monthly close process.Participate in continuous improvement process review, assisting in providing data and analysis for improvements.P&L shared ownership.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree in finance, business administration or related field or equivalent combination of education and experience8 or more years of financial experience including accounting principles and standards and financial reporting & analysis Management experience with strong leadership, coaching, communication, interpersonal, problem-solving and organizational skillsThorough knowledge of budgeting and forecastingStrong communication, collaboration, influence and interpersonal skillsStrong analytical aptitude and critical thinking skills with demonstrated results driving critical strategies forwardAbility to work in a fast-paced environment and manage project deadlines and competing priorities effectivelyStrong business acumenInitiative to drive corrective actions around opportunities

About Working For Hearth & Home Technologies

Take ownership of your career with a job that ignites your passions and rewards your hard work. At Hearth & Home Technologies, you will have the opportunity to Burn Brighter working with a supportive team developing industry-leading hearth products.

Hearth & Home Technologies is an operating division of HNI Corporation (NYSE: HNI). We design, manufacture and distribute a wide variety of gas, electric, wood and biomass burning fireplaces, inserts, stoves and accessories. Lakeville, Minnesota is our home, but we have locations throughout the United States.

Experience Level (if available): Director
